column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Next up was a Chicago Classic.  I think it's official: I don't like deep dish pizza.  I don't get it
column2: I think it's too heavy and I can barely make my way through more than one slice.  The more I ate it
column3: the less I liked it.  The tomato sauce and cheese were good
column4: there was too much sausage and the butter crust was just okay.
